message: Any thoughts or ideas? Could talk about Sphinx features, read the docs features, how to write good docs, DDD (docs/readme driven dev)
I've somehow ended up hosting a site about documentation, so I'm wondering if having a Documentation BOF might be interesting
I'm sure we could rope @jacobian into it after his docs talk, if we had something interesting to talk about
Count me in too. I'd be interested in talking about a potential restructuring of the Pytho documentation.
@ericholscher  - as far as writing, DDD  I've setup http://us.pycon.org/2011/openspaces/importhuman/  ...  could certainly make this part of a broader Doc BOF
Sweet. Let's def. combine and conquer and write awesome things :)
@ericholscher - great:  I'm way cool w/ that, great!
